attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is the most terrible app I’ve ever payed a hand on. It takes up sooo much space on my phone, take TWO hours to download... it’s just not worth it.

attributes.title: this man is has no humanity
attributes.review: he calls imagents animals and who else called ppl that aren’t like him... HITLER so yea i only download this to give a terrible rating so it gets taken off the app store

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I opened the app to see a good president and got a Cheeto puff, I think the apps messed up, and should be banned for such inappropriate content. This is NOT child appropriate nor is the racism and homophobia. This app was a no from me

attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: I downloaded this app trying to learn more about trump and so I can get reasons to vote for him and it caused my grandma to die so I am rating this app 1 star I wish I could go lower

attributes.title: I hate Donald Trump
attributes.review:
Am I the only one who hates Trump, I hate his guts. But in the Bible it says not to speak too bad about your president so this is what I have to say:
This Cheeto y’all call your president is horrible an d he’s a orange version of hitler.

attributes.title: Lame cheeto
attributes.review: This app is so glitchy and when I first opened the app, i saw not the president but an oversized cheeto puff and he does not have the ability to be president of the united states. I think Obama was wayyyyy better, anyone agrees?

attributes.title: Made my phone glitch bad 👁👄👁
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch a lot. It made my WiFi horrible and took up a lot of storage. Maybe bc this app is about a BIG orange. Who knows tho.✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: My dog said he didn’t really like the app he said that it’s too colorful and that it shouldn’t be that colorful so that’s too bad and my fish didn’t like it either

attributes.title: plz just go jump off a bridge 🙈💕🌸
attributes.review: trump is a very sick and disgusting old man and if you actually consider voting for him AGAIN after all he did to this country you honestly belong in a mental institution 🥰🦋🌸🌷☀️☁️🌈
